text: Andrew Lewis (11 December 1970 - 4 May 2015), nicknamed "Six Heads", was a Guyanese professional boxer in the middleweight division. He was the WBA World Welterweight Champion. Lewis was born in Georgetown. He died in a motorcycle accident, aged 44. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Boxers Category:People from Georgetown, Guyana Category:Road accident deaths Category:Sport in Guyana
title: Andrew Lewis (boxing)
